name: This is the end (JK5000)
description:
This is the story about what will happen when the universe ends. Relax and listen to the story, and click on the choices when you see them on the screen.

I strongly recommend playing this game with headphones.

I have made a small bug fix for the game, it change nearly nothing but it fix dumb little bug. You find it here https://jk5000.itch.io/thistheendsmall

Good luck and have fun
